title: Ragavendra Raja
author: Ragavendra Raja
content: Terra is an open-sourced blockchain project built to enhance the development of following-generation products and services. Its native token, called before its market implosion, is now rebranded to Terra Classic and denoted with LUNC.Terra Luna Classic (LUNA) Price Prediction 2023The LUNC price was testing the support level of $0.00016041 and $0.00014382 quite a few times. It reversed from the support level of $0.00014382 and now trading inside the symmetrical triangle. As soon as it breaks out of the symmetrical triangle, we can expect a huge rise or fall in the coming weeks.Meanwhile, our long-term LUNC price prediction for 2023 is bullish since it cannot break the present support level soon. We can expect LUNC to reach $0.00024944 in 2023.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: People have got enough of anything related to Do Kwon, LUNA/LUNC, and anything about it. Whether it goes by that prediction of yours, I'm sure that only those people that will FOMO out of it will rebuy it. We may not know what's the future of it but I think that it's going to be that much for those people that have suffered a lot from the fall of it even now. The interest on it has became lesser and people don't want to touch or invest on it anymore.

comments.author: kizlod
comments.body: It's hard for me to understand that people are actually buying LUNC and believe in it. I get that Do Kwon has nothing to do with it now, but it was rug-pulled one time, who says it can't happen again?

The interest on it has became lesser and people don't want to touch or invest on it anymore.yes because too many people lost big money in that project, many of my friends are crazy because of that, that's why I always stay away from any project related to LUNA, it doesn't look attractive even it can be dangerous whenever people can lose more money in the future, the way to make crypto bullish now is to stay away and never buy any LUNA coins

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: Ragavendra Raja on January 09, 2023, 06:20:50 AMTerra Luna Classic (LUNA) Price Prediction 2023The LUNC price was testing the support level of $0.00016041 and $0.00014382 quite a few times. It reversed from the support level of $0.00014382 and now trading inside the symmetrical triangle. As soon as it breaks out of the symmetrical triangle, we can expect a huge rise or fall in the coming weeks.Meanwhile, our long-term LUNC price prediction for 2023 is bullish since it cannot break the present support level soon. We can expect LUNC to reach $0.00024944 in 2023.Why of all the thousands of coins out there you choose LUNA, it just reminded people of the huge money they lose here and how one guy created a whole mess, and the whole industry suffered, there's no trust in this coin anymore and if the price is going up because there are whales who will pay people to shill it so they can dump their bag, this is a coin destined to oblivion and it gets shill because whales are looking to make a profit, then they will dump this project, Luna's glory days are over.

comments.author: Hildentine
comments.body: I think Luna is a great project in past but in this time not anyone say easily about the future price of Terra LUNA classic because the people already huge loss so the question is that why people again trust in this coin if they refill the people loses so chance is that its improve there position.

We can expect LUNC to reach $0.00024944 in 2023.Why of all the thousands of coins out there you choose LUNA, it just reminded people of the huge money they lose here and how one guy created a whole mess, and the whole industry suffered, there's no trust in this coin anymore and if the price is going up because there are whales who will pay people to shill it so they can dump their bag, this is a coin destined to oblivion and it gets shill because whales are looking to make a profit, then they will dump this project, Luna's glory days are over.Even though it's clear that this shitcoin has sparked chaos before so many investors have suffered from the price collapse to $0,000.... so obviously not many will believe it anymore let alone buy it but whoever they are still hoping for a flying LUNC shitcoin is something to be proud of. it's hard to tell them that LUNC is now useless.To the OP if you want to choose a long term coin 2023-2025 why not choose bitcoin or ETH? Actually, there are still many other types of coins that are worth investing in except shitcoin LUNC, I even doubt their future career.

comments.author: dothebeats
comments.body: Why are people trying to revive anything related to LUNA and Do Kwon? Haven't they got enough of that scam that they are still planning to revive it? Should it get the traction once more and boom, I'm pretty sure those who stayed loyal to this coin will also get burned. The man himself is in hiding and cannot appear in public in fear of being deported and arrested by the authorities. Why do people still want to do something with this coin?   It's best to speculate on other altcoins that have been pumped and dumped to hell than this one IMO.

comments.author: TribalBob
comments.body: everyone is hopeless with luna anymore, has left this coin, why are there still finding out and hoping for more from LUNA. there are many coins that are still better than luna at this time, come on, change your thinking if you want to get more profit.

comments.author: JeffBrad12
comments.body: why should someone still invest in luna where this coin has gotten abandoned by even its own dev teams and has caused many to incur losses, I think in 2023-2025 the value will turns zero and it will get delisted eventually.I just don't see any real reasoning why this coin could ever rise again unless there's manipulation done by the whales, I'm sure this coin will just gonna vanish in the upcoming years.

comments.author: wheelz1200
comments.body: This thread seems a little pointless.  For any crypto having price predictions into 2025 seem silly, no one and I mean no one knows what the price will be let alone the market.  And then second there is probably a good chance this coin doesn't even exist by then.  What's the point?

comments.author: lobo13hf
comments.body: seems like futile attempt of luna shilling, for all I know quite literally everyone has considered this coin to be shitcoin, so why still holding onto this coin if it's already going down so hard to the point of no returns.just invest in other coins like matic and bnb, at least they have bigger chance of recovery.

comments.author: TastyChillySauce00
comments.body: I don't know why there are stupid people who beliving in this scam coin is still exist in the market. LUNC will not go anywhere. It will stay at the current price. The hype is gone and lunc will be going up due to the speculation only. I meat we must take a look at the fact that if the hype has been decreasing a lot. It doesn't even make sense to expect a huge pump to come again,that's enough for people to continue their stupidity to buy this shit scam dead coin. I hope that those stupid investors will be realized there are better coins in the market than this one. It seems like that lunc investors have different speculation like they believe this shit scam will be going to the $1

comments.body: we won't know in the future about terra luna classic coins, but a few months ago the price of terra luna classic became a lot of discussion and at that time the price of terra luna classic, there was a good price increase and many were profit. so it's actually hard to predict the price of this terra Luna classic. on the other hand many people don't like terra Luna classic and on the other hand many like it because many think terra Luna classic  will rise again . So yeah, we'll see later,,,

comments.author: Strongkored
comments.body: Those who still have common sense will really leave this coin and won't want to touch it at all, if someone still believes in this token are people who suffered losses because of the initial case and think they will be able to cover the losses incurred because they believe that This coin can still provide profit potential because the price can rise to the initial price, and this kind of thinking that keeps the crypto world full of deception and manipulation, because only by manipulating the market will be able to make this token rise because logically there is nothing left in this garbage token.

comments.author: Silberman
comments.body: Quote from: Ragavendra Raja on January 09, 2023, 06:20:50 AMTerra is an open-sourced blockchain project built to enhance the development of following-generation products and services. Its native token, called before its market implosion, is now rebranded to Terra Classic and denoted with LUNC.Terra Luna Classic (LUNA) Price Prediction 2023The LUNC price was testing the support level of $0.00016041 and $0.00014382 quite a few times. It reversed from the support level of $0.00014382 and now trading inside the symmetrical triangle. As soon as it breaks out of the symmetrical triangle, we can expect a huge rise or fall in the coming weeks.Meanwhile, our long-term LUNC price prediction for 2023 is bullish since it cannot break the present support level soon. We can expect LUNC to reach $0.00024944 in 2023.If you want to trade LUNA then no one can stop you, but why bother doing all of that analysis when we already know the coin has no future? It is not even known if the coin can survive for that long as the only ones which are keeping the coin alive are speculators and those that got scammed by Do Kwon and simply refuse to accept this fact, so save yourself the trouble, and your talents, and trade other coins which at least could have some possibility of growing significantly on the future instead of trading this scam coin.

comments.author: OcTradism
comments.body: It's Terra Luna Classic with a ticker $LUNC. It has no longer been $LUNA.Because Do Kwon and his team chose a terrible decision to protect $UST, not initial $LUNA, their team minted a lot initial $LUNA and dumped it on Binance. Price fell to the hell and their Terra Foundation Guard Treasury no longer has enough fund to compensate their users, investors. They don't have fund to buy back and burn $LUNC.Price can not rise without buy back and burn a lot of tokens that were minted in May 2022.Community and some exchanges are doing some buy back and burn programs but to help $LUNC recovers, those programs must continue and even with bigger budgets. Do you ask why exchanges have to do that, waive their income from trading fee to buy back and burn the token?

comments.author: Yatsan
comments.body: Quote from: robelneo on January 09, 2023, 02:58:44 PMQuote from: Ragavendra Raja on January 09, 2023, 06:20:50 AMTerra Luna Classic (LUNA) Price Prediction 2023The LUNC price was testing the support level of $0.00016041 and $0.00014382 quite a few times. We can expect LUNC to reach $0.00024944 in 2023.Why of all the thousands of coins out there you choose LUNA, it just reminded people of the huge money they lose here and how one guy created a whole mess, and the whole industry suffered, there's no trust in this coin anymore and if the price is going up because there are whales who will pay people to shill it so they can dump their bag, this is a coin destined to oblivion and it gets shill because whales are looking to make a profit, then they will dump this project, Luna's glory days are over.I have the same thoughts. Also, if a token has already a bad reputation, then why would you risk your funds investing into it? Everything especially market prices in this industry are solely dependent with the demand. Impression and image of the token highly affects the demand which I think makes it a risky investment. This is likewise with projects before which somehow made it to the top but eventually fall; the idea of them being able to be back on their feetm Such thing is possible but I only saw such instances with major coins of this technology annd the reason I guess is the community of users as well as the utility of those particular tokens.

comments.author: el kaka22
comments.body: There is this insisting on keeping this alive, and I am not entirely sure why? Like I get that you liked it beforehand, but then after what has happened happened, how could we say that it is still a thing? I am not entirely sure if that makes sense to me at all.I understand that it is not going to be an easy thing at all to accept the situation they are in, but that doesn't change the fact that we have not seen anything big at all during this period, it is quite important to make it consider this way at all.
